Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Diversey/Central Park
ShortDescription: Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Sacramento, Belmont California & Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Sacramento, Belmont California and Diversey, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Diversey/Central Park.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Northbound Reroute near Diversey/Central Park
ShortDescription: Northbound #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Sacramento, Belmont and California, due to street blockage near Diversey/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Sacramento, Belmont and California, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Diversey/Central Park.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
